content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were sitting on the beach at salter path, north carolina. i noticed what i thought was a very bright star, but it was moving and appeared to be blinking. it was followed for about 15 seconds by a smaller looking red dot, which disappeared. the first star-like object was making very erratic movements, which appeared to be twirling. 

it came close enough to shore that i could make out the outline of a disc shaped object which was clearly spinning, with red and white lights around the edges of the middle section of the disc. the ufo then flew further away, but we could still see the light from it which seemed to blink from the rotation of the craft. a second one joined it, and began to follow it very erratically. the second one then began to ascend to the upper part of the sky very rapidly. after a few minutes, two military planes tore across the sky in pursuit of the craft, which took off. at this point both crafts disappeared. 

by now, we had all been following the crafts for 45 minutes. when the two planes (clearly planes, as the flight pattern was very straight and had no inexplicable, rapid fluctuations unlike the other two lights) came in pursuit the two discs took off. a very low flying plane closely followed the two jets. 

about 20 minutes later, we witnessed something hovering stationary over the water for roughly 30 seconds, then slowly move forward towards the beach. once it reached the shore, it flew sideways, and then began to move forward again. it had two red lights, one on the left and right sides of the front of the craft, and a white light in the middle of the two red ones. there was also a white or orange light possibly on the underside of the craft flashing downwards. 

my family and i have been going to this same part of salter path for 19 years. never before have we seen anything like it. all of us are used to seeing planes and helicopters flying at night, as there is a military base in the vicinity (johnson air force base). the motions of the lights were such that it would be impossible for a plane or a helicopter. furthermore, we identified a disc shaped object to be the source of the lights.
content.summary: Disc shaped object with red and white lights observed for 45 minutes over the ocean

content.detailedDescription:
Salzhausen, de

begegnung (encounter)

a friend and i wanted to visit his sister in the hospital. it was about 30 minutes before the start of work.   my friend saw something in the sky and told me that i should watch it.  i saw it, we were not crazy. 
it was similar to a rocket, but had four points of flames which looked like they were at the head, right and left and bottom. 
it was very scary. 
 i doubt i can say anything to someone without being labeled a crazy.
content.summary: English translation of prior de report of 4/29/09 event

content.detailedDescription:
Was driving east on an access road parallel to 285 in doraville around 5 30 pm saw a silver object over the high way it came over the access road and hovered for a 5 minute period of time then went south over what use to be the gm plant then came back over the access rd next to the highway.  it stayed in this position for awhile then began moving forward and the traffic which had stopped began moving with the object.  it was moving along very slowly, then as we approached buford hwy., it took off at an enormous speed.
  it was a silver disc pretty large about the size of two cadillac's.  it's center was a combination of lights, blue, green, yellow, orange, that were rotating in a clockwise position with the body of the disc.  at the bottom was also smaller disc which was rotating counterclockwise, also with colored lights.  it was odd because how can something which is hovering and standing still in the air have colored lights also spinning clockwise when it's bottom is spinning counterclockwise?  also in the middle with the lights appeared to be a door that you could see, flashing lights then a door.  it was cool and it excited me alot and i went immediatley to my brother's  house and told him about it.  he believed me and got in his car, but i am sure it was gone, because it was accelerating at such a fast rate, that it would have already been in south carolina by then.  it made a believer out of me.  i saw a show monday night about the abductee's and i decided to write and tell you about this experience.  some one has already called me about this, but i need someone to send me an address, so i can send a drawn picture of the craft.  i have been deliquent about doing this.  i didn't want to appear to be a kook which is what the guy was ridiculed for in the monday show of abductions.  i live in a suburb of atlanta and feel i wouldn't be ridiculed for sharing, if it is not published.  thanks ed norman
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Silver disc with flashing lights in middle going clockwise, base counter

content.detailedDescription:
I wright into germany because my english is not so got

ein freund und ich wollten seine schwester im krankenhaus besuchen weil diese ca 30 min vorher einewiesen wurde, da sah mein freund etwas am himmel und sagte das ich es mir ansehen soll, da sah ich es, wir waren also nicht verr���ckt...
es war einer rackete sehr ���hnlich aber hatte vier helle punkte die wie flammen aussahen, an der spitze, rechts und links und unten
war schon sehr gruselig
wusste auch lange nicht ob ich das jemandem sagen kann ohne als verr���ckt abgestempelt zu werden
content.summary: Begegnung

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were driving and had stopped at a stoplight when i observed an object across the street, near a state park, which appeared to be a paper bag that was on fire drifting slowly back and forth and upward. it was extremely bright orange on the bottom and the top half appeared to be a bright florescent light color that was transparent. it was difficult to tell what size it was. i drove across the street and drove into the park and parked the car as the object was now lifting and right over my head. i got out of the car and stood under it and watched it lift slowly. the bottom was extremely bright orange and there was absolutely not sound coming from object. it was now on a path travelling to my right, or north.
a small cessna aircraft passed overhead and this object followed the craft staying right at its outer wing for a moment, going the exact same speed as the plane. now it appeared to be about half the size of the cessna wing, if i were to compare it in size of the aircraft. from below, it was now appearing as beautiful dayglow orange, the brightest i have ever seen. 
the object then made an immediate 90 degree turn upward and to the west. the mountains were to the west and we observed the object for 2 or 3 minutes longer as it sped away at an enourmous rate of speed. it went into the stars which were just beginning to appear in the sky. it did not go over the mountains, but into space and eventually turned a deep red color as it finally disappeared into the stars until we could no longer see it.
i called the cs police dept. as i was on my way out, from a mcdonald's. they asked for my phone number and i told them i would be home around midnight. when i returned home at 12:30 that night, my babysitter told me the police had been there and asked that i contact them right away. i called immediately and they asked if they could come right over. two police men came to the door within 15 minutes and one took me into one room, and one took my friend into another room for complete details of what we saw. ufo's were taken very seriously at that time, especially in lieu of all the cattle mutilations, etc. in the area. there were even mutilations at the local colorado springs zoo at the foot of pikes peak of buffalo in  the zoo, which were under lights.
the next day, i was on a tour, consequently, at the norad facility in cs. i spoke to an officer there during the tour of the radar area, and he told me there were hundreds of calls of the sighting and it was considered a ufo as it was not on radar and had been unidentified.
i felt extremely honored to have sighted the object.
i have seen other ufo's. one prior in sedona arizona during the morning while fishing in oak creek canyon with my son. we were far into the canyon in oak creek around 10:00 a.M. in 1970, summer. i noticed a large clear snow-white circular object moving just over the canyon edge. based on the sizes of the pine trees at the top of the canyon, this was an extremely large object. it moved slowly off the edge of the canyon and i could only see half of the disc shape. it then moved very slowly back. at first i thought it must be a bulldozer, but realized that was a wilderness area and no one was up there. i watched carefully, it moved outward over the canyon again, then slowly disappeared and i never saw it again. it was at least 60 feet across, if not more. i was most astunded at how beautifully white it was.
another instance was in tucson, arizona in 1985 in the summer. i was with friends in a hot tub overlooking tucson and an object flew over our head very silently and then over the city and disappeared. my friends had seen it before and said they were sure it wasn't a blimp at it made no sound at all. i did appear to be cigar shaped.
again, i just feel honored to have seen these objects. i am a great believer in ufo's and pray that when we do encounter the beings we do not approach them with weapons, but with arms open to share information and understanding.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Sighted ufo and observed for 15 minutes, disappeared into  the west into space at an extreme speed eventually.

content.detailedDescription: Ok, well i've made reports on this before, the planes are going crazy today. at least 100-150 seen leaving trails in criss-cross patterns and checker board type pattern with 2 hours. we're lucky to see a plane here once an hour unless its coming from dyess air force base but those are b-1's and c-130's. definately wasn't those. but anyways i got a video with 3-5 orbs in the video. at one point theres 3 orbs in one frame all near the plane. i've shot about 10 videos of the planes today and this is the only video i see these in.
content.summary: Orbs caught on tape while filming planes

content.detailedDescription: Ok i live in fritch texas and one night me and my friend were outside ufo hunting it was about 11:30 12:00 p.M we seen an object travaling at a high speed we new it wasn't a plane of any kind it was spinning and we see blue red yellow white orange lights on the object so we ran after in for a little while and we see were it landed so we were a little freaked out because it was one of the best sighting we seen in a while so we decided to go check it out the next day when we did we seen that a tree was broken more little trees were bent like they were hovered on we smelled the soil it smelled kinda diffrent thien normal soil would smell like so we broke off a couple of twigs that we though were hovered on and some soil samples and we are still studing the samples we callected it was a pretty cool since i have been into to ufos and aliens when i wasyoung and i will keed looking for ufo and aliens for as long as i live i will tell you sbout every sighting i see
content.summary: Outside ufo hunting at about 1:30 to 3:00

content.detailedDescription: i work in watauga/keller tx- during my lunch (about 6:20 pm) i was outside and looked straight up to see a small white circle maneuvering into and out of a very small cloud...As we watched it traveled away from the cloud to the east (slowly) and stopped. after about 10 minutes a small jet w/ trail flew close by ( i figured a gov. plane checking it out- i thought it might have disappeared as the plane got close because i lost sight of it watching the plane approach, it may not have though...It was still there after the plane went by) a fellow worker saw it and a friend of his on the phone in the neighborhood also looked out and saw it...The customers at the store didn't see it...It was small and after it moved away from the cloud harder to find in the sky. balloons do not maneuver like this nor do they stay still for  long periods of time like this...It was as high as the small wispy cirrus cloud it had gone into and out of at first- the fellow worker tried to photograph it with his phone, but said it didn't show up. incidentally, a few weeks ago (at lunch again about 5 or 6pm... a different co-worker and i saw a similar white craft that moved slowly across the sky ...It never stayed still like this one though...Just moved too slowly to be any airplane...) i had to go back to work at 6:30 (on the 19th) and it was still stationary in the sky when i went in so i don't know how long it was there. at home last night (the 19th) i went outside with binoculars around 11pm but couldn't find anything unusual except within the period of about 30 minutes i saw 3 meteors(!!!) i don't know how that could be related but i thought it was odd. (the persieds(?) are over aren't they?)maybe whoever is flying up there likes to watch the afternoon traffic...It's a very busy area...It's location was approximately above denton hwy./basswood in fort worth.(both times)
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright white dot seen moving in and out of small cloud -then moving east a bit and staying stationary

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the car with two friends on the way home to silsbee, texas from houston after a comedy open mic night. when we approached crosby, texas my friend justin said something about ufos. when i asked him about he said that he had seen them there before. the other friend in the car, kody said he had seen them also. i did not believe them at first, but as we drove down hwy. 90 we began to see a light.

as it came into focus it became clear that it was a triangular craft with white lights on the bottom as well as smaller blinking blue, green, and red ones. the craft hovered very slowly and would make random changes in direction and have sudden bursts of speed. my friends and i decided to follow the craft which we did for nearly an hour and it continued this behavior. at one point we were chasing it and had to stop for a train when the craft suddenly changed direction and flew very low, directly over us. my friend kody got out of the car to look and i rolled down the window and looked up. eventually we lost the craft in the treeline and began to head home. when we hit the highway, we saw it again!

this is the oddest experience of my life. i have no idea what the craft could be. i also don't know how everyone doesn't know about this, especially if it is common enough that my friend could say "hey there are ufos here" and then we end up seeing and chasing one. the craft and its prescence had no negative effects on my physical condition but it really gave me the creeps
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangular, hovering, silent craft over crosby, texas.

content.detailedDescription: I was cooking out in my back yard last night and noticed a bright light moving towards my home moving very slowly. its stopped above my yard and hovered their all night. from time to time it relocated its positon. it appeared to be right below the cloud level. it has been coming back every evening but in different parts of the sky. it can be seen from inside my house tonight through the skylight in ther living room. i lookin at the object with a neighbors telescope and it appears to look likr the moons surface with craters. sometimes it blinks red and blue colors and changes to a trianle shape. i would really like to take a video of it if i can find one that will show objects that far away. when i first saw the object i thought it was a planet but realised it was too close to be a planet or a star.I watch it desend in the morning when i woke up and it went straight up way past the cloud level untill it was ony a tine spec straight up above me.I was am very excited to find out more of this object and it is visible right now!
content.summary: Bright white lite and others blinking red and blue speres

content.detailedDescription:
My sister and i were driving on interstate highway 94 to my best friend's funeral,  we were near eau clair, wisconsin
i was watching the clouds because i like to, and in case there would be a 'sign' from my friend.

i suddenly noticed a tube-shaped cloud going the same speed we were! there were 'legs' like a centipede would have, but they were wispy, mostly. then i noticed more of them. i don't think my sister saw them because she had to drive.
they were similar to contrails but without planes.

they were eerie, but didn't feel evil. i had a neutral feeling about them, emotionally. but i did get video footage and one regular photo.
after seeing them for about 30 minutes we stopped for gas, angled into a different direction, and i didn't see them again.
they didn't make sharp turns like in the other description.

i'll upload a video - if it doesn't work, it can be seen at:

http://s283.Photobucket.Com/albums/kk283/gregorsamsa/clouds/?Action=view&current=wormcloudnot2x-1.Flv
content.summary: Speedy larval clouds/planeless contrails like other 08/09 wi description - video.

content.detailedDescription:
Witness reported seeing a large, pulsating red light being circled in a clockwise direction by three smaller, white lights at an altitude described as "just above cloud cover", and ese of his house. he was shooting video, and when played back it showed several more lights surrounding the larger red light. all were circling it in a clockwise direction, while at the same time moving in unison toward the red light and then away from it, repeating this pattern for the duration of the sighting, which had already been in progress for about three hours when he called dispatch.

witness said his wife had filed a report (#18713) with mufon last week detailing a similar sighting of four hours' duration, although i could find
no record of it.
content.summary: Narrative below was based submitted by mufon dispatch for witness based on phone conversation with witness.

content.detailedDescription: I was trying to take photos of the meteor shower in my backyard. right after the bright meteor hit the atmosphere i starting taking pictures with my camera. i noticed what looked like a star getting closer, so i assumed it was another meteor. i realized when it darted in a unusual path and left this kind of star dust behind it that something was off. i kept taking pictures and then something got closer that was kinda oval shaped and it had two bright lights. it reminded me of star wars because they were so brightly white. then it was gone. i was so amazed at what i had seen, i ran inside the house to pull the pictures up on my computer. when i zoomed in i realized that i had caught it on camera. the only thing i didn't catch was the meteor. i am still not sure what i saw that night, it was out of this world for sure. i decided to ask some of my friends who i could talk to about this event and they directed me to this website.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Almost like a shooting star but different trail pattern kinda oval shaped with two bright lights

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my deck in back of the house in new gloucester, me. it is a clear night with lots of stars, when something caught my eye in the northeast.  it was at a very high angle and moving in a southerly direction, at first i thought it was a sattelite, when suddenly it became extremely bright, then dimmed again still traveling until in a second or two it disapeared. i heard no engines, it was very quiet out there. i ran inside to get my camera hoping it would reappear, but it never did, this all took place about a half hour ago. i'm going back out in case it comes back.  hopefully i can get a picture.
content.summary: A dim star which got intensely bright, then dimmed northeast traveling south, not a plane or sattelite or star! no sound, way up there.

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of august 18, 2009, at about 2200, i went out to my balcony to get fresh night air and to look at the stars. i first noticed a standard commercial airliner in the sky pass by overhead. then suddenly, i seen an unusual but faint flashing light, approximately north-west, then it appeared. man it was really weird, an arrow shaped object (maybe 60 degrees at it's vortex) consisting of three (constant) lights at each end point, with two lights at its center. it was approximately 10k to 15k miles high and passed over my building at a rapid pace.  it seemed like it did not have a solid body connecting the lights. now, i have seen helicopters in a triangular formation. i was an avionics technician in the navy; i know how to discern different forms of aircrafts. the whole event lasted about 60 seconds.  the object i saw was not of this world���..
i could not belive what i had seen. 
or, can it have been an unconventional military aircraft.
content.summary: Triangle/ arrow

content.detailedDescription:
Witness over 30 minutes of real ufo sighting recorded august 13 2009 right in the front of our home in kissimmee, florida.

this exclusive real ufo sighting can very well be some of the best ufo footage ever caught on tape.

this real ufo sighting all started on our way to taco bell to pick up some dinner to eat. when we were driving all of a sudden we spotted several ufo's which sparked our curiosity so we followed them for 15-20 minutes until we lost them or they disappeared.  

then upon arriving back home pulling in our driveway we spotted several more real ufo's which resembled energy orbs/spheres right outside our house coupled with what looked like to be hi-tech looking military aircraft.

i then ran inside the house and grabbed my canon zr960 video recorder which has a 2,000x digital zoom allowing us to capture some of the most incredible real ufo footage ever recorded. 

real ufo sighting august 13th 2009 - real ufo sighting over 30 minutes caught on video

you will also notice these real ufo energy orbs/spheres materialize forming new ufo's from thin air. this is absolutely amazing and possibly some of the most mind-numbing in your face real ufo footage ever caught on film.

link to youtube video playlist of 30 mins of ufo footage:

http://www.Youtube.Com/view_play_list?P=768c9b49fce67801
content.summary: Real ufo sighting august 13th 2009 - real ufo sighting over 30 minutes caught on video

content.detailedDescription:
Wow, it's as though i wrote that original event description myself!  i saw the exact same thing at (almost) the exact same time from my back deck in grand ronde, oregon.  only difference is that i only saw two.  the time was 12:00 midnight +/- 15 minutes. 

i ufo hunt almost every night and see all sorts of odd things and since i live in the forrest, i have excellent viewing because of zero city light interference.  these were not satellites, as i've learned through the years to recognize them.  sats don't stop in mid-flight, blink brightly several times and then carry forward at a different speed.

i'm getting an "error" when i try to submit this report regarding the time (midnight +/- 15 minutes on aug 12, 2009 pt) so i'm going to try other "times" in order to move the report through but the actual event time is as stated avove.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: In re: case # 18735.

content.detailedDescription:
Murrysville:  9:01 pm.  just turned off route 22 onto mellon rd., heading south when noticed a couple of random flashing lights near top of hill past ader rd.  pulled over on side of road and got out with camcorder.  lens was dirty & wouldn't focus.  farmer who owns land came out to see if i needed help.  he saw my camcorder and asked if i got anything.  i replied, not yet, but we've been seeing so many ufos around here, i shoot all objects with the zoom to see what they really are.  he started telling me about his dad's saucer sighting in the early 70s and how he knows people who were at kecksburg, etc.  he wished me good luck and started walking back to his house.  i turned to go back to my car and noticed a large bright yellow-ish orb light over the farm field pretty low above the trees.  it dimmed and brightened.  i starting shooting.  the guy came back up and got to see his first ufo sighting.  it hovered, dimmed, then showed back up higher, brighter, double the size, like it was closer, then moved way back, dimming and going out of focus in the cam, over and over... several minutes of this.  when i moved across the road to avoid the car's lights whizzing past, i noticed it looked farther back away from me.  my daughter and i decided to chase it, like we have in the past.  by the time we went around to where it was, it was moving more west towards route 66.  we turned around and raced up to top of another hill by farm field with great view on ader road.  from there, facing south, i could see it dim and brighten.  by the time i shut the car off, got out and started filming, i busted it going from 1 bright ball of light into a "fake plane" ufo that i've seen and filmed before.  it  had turned around from heading west to going approximately nw.  all the while increasing the number of flashing lights and the flash patterns.  i could tell in the video that it's similar to ones i filmed on june 16, july 23, & 25 and posted on youtube in hd.  the full length of this chase is 2 parts, over 2gig & 16 minutes long and is viewable on my channel:  seeingufospa with the others. 
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=t8jq5rjzrgg 

why do we see so many ufos?  because we look, all the time, all day/night long... and hey, maybe they like us.
content.summary: Murrysville: powered-down triangle over farm field-chased & busted!

content.detailedDescription:
On 16.August about 23:30 hours i was watering the garden and this object catch my attention.The object was round and orange in color.I must say that night was very clear and the sky was full of stars.This object just appear in a moment about 5km high.All the time object was changing directions with great speed left and right and in some moment it was just hoovering in place.The shape was like the big fireball with the red illuminations from bottom of the object.I manage to grab my camera and take one photo then run to house and grab my video camera.(the movie that i recorded last for about 30 sec. when i return from vacation i will send you the clip).On the clip it is clearly visible how the object move left and right with the great speed and in one moment it just run straight to the sky and didn't been visible for about three seconds.It just disappear  among the stars.After three second it came down again and with the great speed cross the sky in the direction of island pag.
im sending you the photo of object i will like to know what is it.It was not a plane or helicopter because it moved with impossible speed and changing direction in the same time.
content.summary: Strange circle object in orange color wich was moving very fast

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching fireworks with my family on july 4th when a series of red glowing objects began appearing above the horizon, and floating upwards ��������� following each other in a zig-zag shape. my brother took a series of images, which were unfortunately a bit blurry. the attached is the best example. it would seem obvious that these were fireworks, but they were much higher, moved upward for 5 or 10 minutes in a very slow, controlled fashion, and seemed quite far away (they cast no reflection on the lake ��������� i expect they were at least 5-10 miles away) and large, based on the distance. it was difficult to make out any shape or mass. they were amber to red in color. there were 7 witnesses total, all of whom were mesmerized and didn't know what to make of the event, and i assume many people in the area (twin lakes, wi in the lake geneva area) saw this.
��������� very strangely, we witnessed a similar event last july 4, though it was only 1 light of the same color, higher and farther away, moving very fast across the sky.
content.summary: Floating orbs over wi lake on july 4

content.detailedDescription:
One night i went to the local shops. it was late. on the way home about 40 yards away from my house i noticed a small humming sound and a smell of burnt out pc board. i stop'd dead in my tracks and folowd the sound up.
there in front of me about 40 foot above the house's across the road from me was a huge jet black triangle. i knew strait away this was nothing to be scared of but there was no feeling from me but awe and amazement. i looked left then right and scanned the craft absorbing every detail. after my 3rd eye sweep it started moving to my right and up. speed was around 0-700mph+ in 2 seconds.It moved with a increasing speed from stand still to 50mph 0.3seconds 50mph to 150 0.5seconds 150+ 0.5 seconds. it moved front of craft single point first and yawed strait up like a earth craft will point its noise up to go up. until the craft was vertical. there was a moon out and a little cloud. the craft moved through a cloud and made a small hole in it.
the moon was in the right place to show me through the craft when it was hovering over the house's and highlight the clouds so i can see them clearly.
i walked to my house. i think?
the craft was jet black around 300ft long 200wide maybe 150ft thick.Probably bigger. there was no marks on the craft and no lights. every edge and angle was perfect. no sound expect the low level electric hum.One tone.And a feeling of energy and a smell like electric.
as i looked at the craft i noticed a deadly silence in the air.I noted this because you can always hear the main roads and a ambient sound of city life.
two final things that scare me more then the event.One. i had a feeling that they(craft) was reading my mind. then a feeling of oh hes watching us(they thought this) wofted across my mind.Then the craft shot off at huge speed.
second. some how and i don't know how i managed to block all events from the night out of my mind for few years. my partner cannot remember me coming in saying anything about triangle craft.Or anything like that.About 3 to 4 years after me and my partner was watching tv when a program came on about a huge triangle ufo over some military base's in uk. it all came back instantly.Every detail except what hapend after when i entered my house.
i have not seen anything before this or after this.
content.summary: Huge black triangle hovered over fordhouses wolverhampton

content.detailedDescription: I walked out into my back yard and noticed what i thought was a very bright star. as i looked at it, it was flickering all kinds of colors. i watched it for a moment and noticed it was moving south to northwest very slowly. i realized it was moving way too slow to be an airlplane. it didn't make any noise so i knew it wasn't a helicopter, and obviously it wasn't a star. i ran inside and grabbed my camcorder and my wife and we watched it slowly move away. at times it appeared to have stopped and then continue moving again. my wife doesn't believe in anything and this got her attention. she watched it through binoculars as i taped. i proped the camcorder on a nearby table so you can see just how slowly it was moving without me shaking the camera. i have attached a couple of pics from the video for your review. i have the original video if anyone wants to analyze it.
content.summary: Saw flashing light lin sky, grabbed cam corder and taped for about 45 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
Http://news.Yahoo.Com/nphotos/world-photos-10th-mountain-division/ss/708/im:/090819/481/e4e50b47dfc84dcdae612da146897a5e/;_ylt=ah220gjghurucwgjopnzv.Dlwmcf

just thought i would post and see what others thought
content.summary: Saw this on yahoo photo's

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 11:40pm 8/18, i observed a streak of light in the sky in the metro boston, ma area while shore fishing. it appeared to be a shooting star, or a meteor entering the atmosphere at first, then it changed direction. it made a 90 degree or so turn upwards, then another 90 degree turn (in a "z" pattern) and continued to travel in the same direction as it originally was. it was a white glowing spherical shape with a tail. i noticed after it made the second turn that the area around the white glow was black. it was noticeable due to the light cloud cover which was slightly illuminated by the city lights.
content.summary: Streak of light over boston makes a "z" turn

content.detailedDescription:
I was going to san antonio from houston.  on the way, i spotted a white object flying from west to east.  i thought it was an airplane at first, but it was a white sphere. i quickly took my camera and tried to film it.  during the first attempt. i didn't zoom in so the object looked very small in the video.  during the second clip, i zoomed in to the max, but i didn't do a very good job getting it in the field of vision.  but, i did manage to get a glimpse of it.  

there was a separate incident in san antonio, tx.  i was staying at hilton on westover hills blvd.  same date, august 16th, at around 945 pm, i saw a pulsating flying object flying across the sky from south to north.  i was roasting mash mallows and watching "curious george" on the big wall in the courtyard at the hotel.  i didn't have my camera then.  i observed the sky throughout the night, there was no other aircraft flying through that area (i guess it is not a flying zone).  i tried to film the next night, but i didn't see anything in the sky.
content.summary: White sphere flying from west to east near hwy 10 in tx

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i was traveling to newark, stoped 4 a burger.As we sat in the car we saw lights come up from behinde the buildings across the way.We thought at firt they was hot air ballons but they all went on the same line there was no fire or anything that said they was hot air ballons.We got out of the car and watched could not make them out .Not only there was 1 but 8 going up a few seconds between each one. there was other people stoping and looking as they was amazed to wot they was and that was that. they had gone way out of sight in the distance.My husband and i said they are not flars or ballons they was just strange???? and so we went and carried oneating and went on our way to milton keynes.  we did not take photos but we will never forget wot we saw
content.summary: Just orange |gold like fire orb there was 8 came up and fly the same way many people saw them

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dogs in my neighborhood at 3:50 am (i get up a 3:30 am to get ready for work).  and as i do every morning, i was looking up in the sky admiring the large number of stars.  as i came rounded the corner, i noticed a bright object in the sky that i hadn't seen earlier.  it was in the north eastern sky, and was flashing different colors.  at first i thought it was an airplane, but then a much smaller round blue object came out from the bottom of it.  the smaller object moved down and around the larger object and then disappeared.  thinking this could not be a plane, i watched the object for about 2 more minutes, then continued my walk - looking up every now and then to see if the object was still in the sky.  it never left its position.   when i got back to my house at 3:55 am, the object was still visible.  

the whole time i was watching the object, i was more curious than anything else as i had seen similar objects just last week at the little mount hoffman lookout, near mount shasta, ca (i stayed there for two nights).  however, none of these objects ejected anything like this one did.
content.summary: Multi-color, flashing circular object

content.detailedDescription:
I was on vacation with my father in the field, arrived late to camp. 
the night was cold and clear sky .
in the sky could see an intense light that changes color at a distance of 300 meters.
the object is moving steadily in a straight line and color changes constantly, were very strong lights, yellow, green, blue and red.
we knew that it was, we had a presentiment that it was a ufo.
within seconds disappeared completely, the following day the people asked us if havi publ seen the lights in the sky.
told us that they often tend aprec at night in the sky, was a very nice experience to feel that we are not alone in the universe.
content.summary: Bright red, blue, green and yellow distance approximately 300 meters

content.detailedDescription:
I went to camp columbus near waterton national park in alberta canada when i was about 14 - 15 years old. i remember one day sitting out side  the camp in the field with a few girls in a circle. i can recall there were about 5 of us sitting together talking about the normal things girls talk about at that age, namely boys, school, sports and how we were liking camp.  at the end of the field there was 2 or 3 girls we were not friends with at the camp that were also hanging out talking. as we talked i noticed one of the girls sort of getting distracted in the conversation and she  was looking past the girl directly across from her up at the mountain...But we kept on talking and her eyes seemed mezmorized. finally she seemed to get a bit nervous but not scared and was intrigued and we all kind of wondered what was wrong with her. then she said  "hey guys what do you think that is?" and pointing in the direction of the mountain in front of her. there was a river in front of the mountain and it stood a long ways up from where we were sitting, the camp cabin was slightly to the right of where we were sitting. when i looked up i saw nothing for a second just the mountain but then sure enough looking back to see if we were in the direction of her finger, this thing came up from behind the mountain and it was this very large shiny but some how not blinding. it looked the color  and had the metallic shine of mercury and was in the shape of a perfect sphere and was much bigger then a plane or helicopter, i would guesstimate it was 4-5 times the size of a helicopter. it looked as though it was very made of a very strong yet light and quick material so not like metal.  we were all shocked but for some reason we were not scared. i think we were all in shock and one of the girls joked and said something about " don't worry its just a flying metal spoon". it did look a lot like this it was like if you took a metal spoon and turned it up side down and glued it to another right side up, the only difference was that it appeared seemless, like a smooth line in the center as though it was completely fabricated from one piece of material and it cast a shadow sometimes over the mountain but then would quickly disappear behind the mountain as well but only for a few seconds before reappearing. oh and it was completely silent.

 we laughed and one of the girls started to finish the story she was telling before the girl interrupted about this phenomenon...Sounds crazy but it honestly seemed like it controlled our brains because i can't believe i reacted that way when i think about it, it was that or so shocking our brains couldn't seem to process what we were seeing. so as this girl started talking about 1 minute in the girl said again "k seriously you guys what is that". it was hovering up and down  in great heights in a matter of split seconds, and then sometimes slower, it appeared to me almost as though it was attempting to land on the mountain or spying on us. we starred at it for a minute and then i said     " you guys we have got to get everyone and show them this or they aren't going to believe this". i then looked around and realized there were the other girls we weren't friends with at the end of the field... i could see them looking in the same direction. i yelled to them " hey are you girls looking at that thing too?" they yelled back "yah, what is that?" i said "i have no idea, its definetly not a plane". they agreed and said " what should we do?" i started getting frantic because i could not believe what i was seeing and i knew no one was going to believe us but felt relieved these girls we weren't friends with were seeing it to, because these girls were the smart, goodie goodies of the camp and would never make something like this up but i could see the counsellors not believing me because i was kind of a trouble maker in that i liked having fun and goofing around. my best friend at the time of this was in the cabin helping get dinner ready with the counsellors because she had sprained her ankle the day before so she could barely walk and didn't want to walk out to sit with us.  all the girls kept watching it and then saying " omg what should we do?" i said we have to get everyone out here to see this, .All the girls were getting a little scared and nervous at this point and so i told them to stay together and i would go get everyone cause i was a fast runner. i ran to the camp which was maybe a 30 second run about 1/3 of a total block away so not too far. i ran in the kitchen frantic yelling for everyone to get outside...My friend was sitting down and i told her to get up and tried to pick her up and told her she needed to come see this there was a ufo or something outside. once the counsellors all learned what i was trying to say they tried to dismiss me, all but 1, i said no no you have to come see this, trust me i would not make this up, there are about 10 of us that saw it and they are all out there watching it. they were taking their time so i left them and ran back out, the girls said it was still there and the counsellors and other girls from camp were quick to follow. they came out and said " k what is going on, where?". all of us girls said "right there" and at the same time pointed. at the moment i started to point at it, it went behind the mountain almost looking as though it disappeared into thin air. we were all shocked but expected it to come back up as it had so we waited, but nothing it was gone. we all swore that it would come back but it didn't. i hoped the counsellors and my friend especially had seen it but they said they saw nothing and instead all but my friend and one counsellor started accusing me of lying and making things up. then the other girls who it was known we were not friends with came up and defended me saying " no its the truth we saw it to, swear to god, we saw a ufo" they askedif we had pics and then we realized most of us had cameras sitting right in our laps or in our pockets but it was like i was completely unaware of it when i saw the object, again something i would not normally do, so i think this was due to shock or some kind of control over us that not one of us thought to take a picture. of course most of the girls that didn't see it wanted to know all the details so we told them. then some cried as they were scared they were going to be abducted, others were excited it definitely sparked the flame in the camp. the head counsellor pulled me aside and told me she was thinking of sending me home because i had caused all this trouble and fabricated this big lie that now had all these girls scared to sleep. i swore to her i was not lying and that there was more than me that saw it and even girls we weren't friends with that never in their life would tell a lie. she told me she didn't know what to believe but to stop talking about it or i would be sent home. i shut up after that and even though i was a little nervous and unsure of what i saw i didn't want to get sent home so i shut up and tried to calm the girls. the next afternoon around 2 pm we were split into groups and i am sure that all of us that claimed to have seen the ufo the day before were forced to stay back at camp while the others went kayaking on the river below the mountain. everything was quiet for a few minutes and all of a sudden all these girls and grown adult counsellors came running full tilt into the cabins yelling...We asked what all the chaos was about and the girls started yelling they saw the ufo too. the counsellor that had threatened to send me home came up and said it was true they saw them to and apologized for not believing me, they described seeing the same thing as us above the mountain and by the river but about 7 of them and they sounded smaller then the one we had seen. we weren't sure if they were joking or not with us, in a way making fun of us but everyone seemed truely frightened and genuine. i cannot remember if my friend went but i don't think she did, i do think that one or two of the girls that saw it the day before did see it though because i can recall someone saying they were similar but much smaller then the one we saw.

 to this day i can't grasp what i saw, it appeared to be of material i have never seen, in a shape and size i have never seen, at a speed i have never ever seen again to this day. i know for a fact i saw it and unfortunately i never kept in touch with the other girls that saw it, but i often think it would be neat to meet with them and discuss what it was we saw then as young teens now as adults. i am sure i have this written somewhere in a diary and it may provide more info then i can recall. i never didn't not believe but i never did believe either before i saw what i saw that summer day, but i know that i definetly saw something there and am wondering if anyone else has seen something similar there too.
content.summary: Hovering shiny and bright ufo hovers over mountain at camp columbus seen by about 7 girls

content.detailedDescription:
In the night of december 24, 2001 i woke up at around 3:25am to "spend a penny". when i went back to bed a minute later i watched the passing clouds. my bed stands directly at the window. from there i have a nice panorama-view into the sky. i love watching the clouds and stars at night. even when i wake up at night as i did on december 24. suddenly i realised three tiny spots in the sky. they looked like passing satellites. what was strange was that there were three of them im a triangel formation. at first i thought it was the space station plus space shuttle and something else from nasa they might have deployed there. these spots flew from east to west. i know that because my window lies in the western direction. it looked like this: one spot in the first place. another one dioganally right behind and the third one diagonally left behind the second one (triangle). 
what changed my mind about the space station was that the third spot suddenly changed his position. it made a turn behind the second one and back behind the first one. it was so fast i had to rub my eyees just to be sure i wasn't slepping. with a puzzling look i watched them disappear behind some clouds in the far. the place where i live at this time is so quiet that u can hear a needle drop on the floor. there was no sound at all. usually you can hear planes flying by in heights up to 10 km. but there was no sound at all. just to make clear there were no fighters or something like that, i worked for the german air force. i know that it's strictly forbidden in germany to fly over big cities like berlin. and i re-emphasize there was no sound at all. fighter turbines scare the hell out of you. even in big heights!

until today i don't know what that was. for me no proof for an alien explanation at all, but unkown... a u.F.O.
content.summary: Triangle formation
